name: Waterfowl Abyss
description:
How to play

Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Jump

hold Z - while in air, Glide

X - Use feather jump after collecting special feather from feather plants

hold X - Pluck a feather from yourself, taking damage but gaining a special feather.

There are 3 level. your goal is to reach the portal at the top of each one.
